channel.description: Recent content in blog on CoreUI

item.title: React? We‚Äôve got (no) problem. Top5 React issues.
item.description: Commonly known as the most popular JavaScript framework‚Ä¶ Wait‚Ä¶ React JS is indeed based on JavaScript, but we‚Äôre not so sure about naming it a framework because‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs rather a library? Which comes first, the chicken or the egg? ;) No matter if we prefer chicken or egg, there‚Äôs no argue that React.js is number 1. Netflix, Instagram, and Facebook are just at the beginning of the long list of web apps developed thanks to React.

item.title: CoreUI & Vue.js Forge‚Ä¶ cause 1 is just not enough!
item.description: If you were thinking on new and exciting ways to learn Vue and get that hands-on Vue.js experience ‚Äì there‚Äôs another great chance to join the biggest Vue.js community.

item.title: Top 8 React UI Framework and Component Libraries in 2022
item.description:
Searching for the right tools for the job has always fascinated developers. Many front-end developers agree that using a widely accepted framework keeps your code lightweight yet robust. That is why many programmers are switching to the React UI Framework - a leading framework that enables effortless runtime performance in cutting-edge UIs.

It ticks all the boxes when building high fidelity, reusable components that can handle high loading and rendering scenarios.

With React, you can design, build and understand a user interface that scales across screens and the browser by separating its data layer from presentation logic. React UI framework and component libraries are at the core of JavaScript to enable unique and highly customisable user experiences.

Today’s post is about the 8 Best React UI Framework and Component Libraries in 2022. So, let’s start.

item.title: Vue.js Forge
item.description: If you were thinking on new and exciting ways to learn Vue and get that hands-on Vue.js experience - here‚Äôs what you need to know!

item.title: How to create a single page application using React.js
item.description: In this tutorial, you will learn how to create a single page application using ReactJS. You will learn how to create a simple ReactJS application that renders a simple message box.

item.title: React v18.0 ‚Äì finally is of legal age?
item.description: It‚Äôs almost a month after official presentation on npm, so it‚Äôs we‚Äôre ready to roll with our remarks on the latest React version. As you know, CoreUI Admin Panel is not another blend of 3rd parties‚Äô free components and libraries. It’s the only Open-Source React Admin Dashboard Template built on the enterprise-grade hand-crafted React UI Components Library. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôve waited patiently for React v18.0, to materialize it e.g. here https://coreui.io/react/.

item.description:
Why React?

To answer that, we could just use this table and say ‚Äì it‚Äôs obvious:

item.title: Quo Vadis Vue.js
item.description:
You‚Äôve probably seen CoreUI‚Äôs Vue Admin Dashboard Template & UI Components Library. If not, apart our hearts are broken, here‚Äôs a link: https://coreui.io/vue/ ;)

We can see, that many of you‚Äôre asking about Vue.js tools designed by CoreUI. You like our ‚Äúkeep it simple‚Äù approach and Vue.js 3 full compatibility, which fuels our work.

item.title: 10+ Free Bootstrap Admin Templates for your Web App 2022
item.description: The creation of professional dashboards is no problem. Thanks to this selection of free bootstrap templates, you will find a practical UI toolkit for your project. Each tool also includes a template for your dashboard that can be customizable to your project. When building the customized dashboard, you have the choice between the different elements and components offered in the template pack. Chart graphics, button alerts, or tables are just a few features you can add.

item.title: Vue UI component libraries 2022
item.description: Saying that Vue.js is one of the fastest-growing JavaScript frameworks is almost like saying nothing. It has a profound collection of external libraries and frameworks that make developing applications quick and easy, even without any prior experience. When talking about Vue‚Äôs growth, it relates to the framework‚Äôs simplicity, availability of libraries, components, and learning materials like e.g. vueschool.io to strengthen the ecosystem.

item.title: Simple Black Friday
item.description: Not long ago, a guy, let‚Äôs name him ‚ÄúKyle‚Äù asked us about CoreUI‚Äôs Tips for developers to create stunning web or app. Anwer was easy: ‚Äúkeep it simple‚Äù :)

item.title: Do we need UI components?
item.description: It‚Äôs not a secret (especially here), that the User Interface (UI) is a huge part of every app. Some say that if the icon is the front door, the UI is the interior design [that‚Äôs why CoreUI brings you both icons and components ;)]. Of course, you can take the route of completely designing your own UI from scratch, but‚Ä¶ we all suffer from a lack of time. So if you want to get it up and running fast while still having a polished finish, an appropriate UI library seems to be the right option.

item.title: Can‚Äôt wait for what the future of Vue holds!
item.description: It cannot be an accident, cause just as we‚Äôve released 90+ Bootstrap based Vue.js components and directives our friends from VueSchool.io told us about their Nuxt Nation Conference 2021. So, joint forces of CoreUI and VueSchool are happy to announce, that a lot of good things will be brought into Vue.js‚Äô World this September.

item.title: CoreUI Vue.js components helped to win a Eurostat hackathon
item.description:
Just a few weeks ago, a nice gentleman from Italy sent us a message:

Dear CoreUI, I am a researcher working at ISTAT, last week I participated in European Big Data Hackathon 2021, organized by Eurostat. And we won using CoreUI Vue.js!

Sounds interesting? That‚Äôs just the beginning ‚Äî let‚Äôs dig deeper, cause it‚Äôs getting hot in here‚Ä¶

item.title: UI Components For Bootstrap ‚Äî Part 1 by Mehwash Patel
item.description: CoreUI is a complete Dashboard UI Kit that allows you to quickly build UX friendly, responsive applications. I‚Äôll be writing about various Bootstrap components in detail in this series. Comment below if you‚Äôve any questions or if you‚Äôd want me to write about a specific CoreUI component. In Part 1 of this series, we‚Äôll look at the components: Alert, Badge and Toast. So without further ado, let‚Äôs get started. Alert component is used to display message to the user.

item.title: Top 10 React Admin Templates & Tools of the Year 2020
item.description: 2020 is almost over‚Ä¶ Thanks to the pandemic, I believe that 99,9% of the global population will be celebrating this coming 2021. But before we’ll do so, enjoy your seat and take a look at this collection of the most beautiful and most all ‚Äì reliable React Admin Templates.

item.title: Earn Real Money on every sale you refer - become a CoreUI PRO affiliate today!
item.description:
$5000/month +

It takes few minutes to join CoreUI‚Äôs Affiliate Program, just fill the simple online form. You can earn $5000/month and more by promoting our software on your website. But the best is yet to come‚Ä¶ In standard affiliate programs cookie has a 30-day life. Your referral needs to make a purchase within 30-days of clicking your affiliate link in order for you to get paid – otherwise the lead will no longer be trackable. CoreUI‚Äôs Affiliate Program keeps track of your referral for 120 calendar days!

item.title: CoreUI Vue Laravel Admin Template ‚Äì more than simple integration...
item.description: Bootstrap Admin Template with Laravel. Really? Sure do cause apart from the integration our team enhanced the template with the examples of useful features implementations.

item.title: Bootstrap v5 arrived ‚Äì even though it‚Äôs alpha, we‚Äôre eager to get more
item.description:
We bet you all know the Buggles‚Äô song:

Almost every week last years we‚Äôve heard that jQuery is slowly going into nowhere, when e.g. Vue.js is striving it‚Äôs way to popularity. So is the story with the Buggles‚Äô song ‚ÄúVideo killed the radio star‚Äù, where title seems to tell everything. Latest Bootstrap Blog: https://blog.getbootstrap.com/2020/06/16/bootstrap-5-alpha/ seems to be the final conformation for Jquery ‚Äì bolded text tells everything: ‚ÄúBootstrap no longer depends on jQuery‚Äù.

And you know what? CoreUI did the same almost year ago. It‚Äôs good to know that we‚Äôre in a good company ‚Äì what‚Äôs even more sexy is that we did it first üòä

item.title: CoreUI 3.0 hooks on React.js?
item.description:
You know CoreUI React.js for so many years, e.g. thanks to Free and Pro versions.

Now it’s time for V3‚Ä¶ What’s the difference?

Reactstrap has been replaced with our own code, which with the new context API and one naming convention across all components ‚Äì brings a lot of new features that help to create amazing user interfaces. Eager to know more? Take a look‚Ä¶

item.title: CoreUI #stayHome #getPro for Free
item.description: No matter if it‚Äôs Poland, the USA, Span, Italy, Russia, or India ‚Äì we allface the same problem. There‚Äôs no wonder then, that many times you‚Äôve been asking us if we could support the worldwide struggle with the COVID-19 spreading. The answer was always easy: YES, YES, YES. That‚Äôs why we give you an -25% discount with #stayHomecode and if it‚Äôs not enough… you can get the PRO license completelyfor free.

item.title: Happy Easter & #stayhome?
item.description: This supposes to be a completely different newsletter‚Ä¶ Our team wanted to wish you a pleasant Easter and enjoy your free time. But things have changed drastically and most of us change our scope. Really? Of course, some things could‚Äôve been done better, yet it is hard to blame anyone for what has or has not been done, this situation is difficult as it is, the main effort now should go towards winning this uneven battle‚Ä¶

item.title: CoreUI Vue.js components library‚Äì gimme more?
item.description: Switching to another Vue components library is never easy. There are multitudes of them available on the market and we all know that you can’t teach an old dog new tricks. So you may ask why should I try CoreUI Vue.js? Below you‚Äôll get 5 good (not bad) reasons.

item.title: CoreUI 3k+ icons set ‚Äì why the ‚Ä¶ did we do this?!
item.description: Webpage or an app interface means nothing if it‚Äôs not glued with sexy set of icons. You know it best. So to be honest, we‚Äôve got an answer for above question. But‚Ä¶ there‚Äôs always a ‚Äúbut‚Äù üòâ You may ask why we let more than 3000 icons to be downloaded for free? X-mas gift, Black Friday in December, New Year‚Äôs madness? No way ‚Äì from now on, you can use CoreUI icons for free. We‚Äôre open source, so it should be for free. Save your time and drag them in your design.

item.title: Laravel rockz?
item.description: You‚Äôve been asking us to introduce CoreUI for #Laravel and as you know ‚Äì your wish is our command üòâ, so here it is: https://coreui.io/laravel/ You can check both Free and PRO versions. What‚Äôs inside? Saying a bunch of responsive, customizable, and reusable components you need to create modern, beautiful, responsive apps is saying (almost) nothing.

item.title: Are you ready for CoreUI 3.0?
item.description:
The beta version has just been released.

Some say‚Ä¶ üòâ that CoreUI admin template is one of the most popular open-source admin panel template. Some may ask ‚Äì why? Because it delivers all responsive, customizable, and reusable components, you might need to create simply beautiful & responsive apps. But the beauty would be nothing without time-to-market. So please cordially welcome CoreUI 3.0 (beta).

item.title: Leave well alone?
item.description: We believe that we all know that sentence, but to be honest - like humans, companies change over time and, when it does, a brand redesign becomes necessary. We bet you noticed latest changes in our design and if you‚Äôre interested in more detailed information, pls read this post.

item.title: What‚Äôs new and updated in CoreUI 3
item.description: Version 3 has been re-written and re-designed completely from scratch. Here are the key changes in v3:

item.title: Bootstrap Icons
item.description: Bootstrap 4 doesn‚Äôt include an icon library by default, that’s why many developers looking for best icons. Where you can find awesome Bootstrap Icons for your project?

item.title: Migration from Bootstrap 3 to Bootstrap 4
item.description: Bootstrap 4 is a major rewrite of the entire project. The most notable changes are summarized below, followed by more specific changes to relevant components.

item.title: How to upgrade Bootstrap 4 alpha 6 to Bootstrap 4 beta
item.description: After two years in the making, Bootstrap creators finally released first beta of Bootstrap 4. In latest version of Bootstrap 4 more then 650 files was changed, 67k lines was added, and 82k lines was deleted.

item.title: How to migrate from Bootstrap 3 to Bootstrap 4 Beta
item.description: Bootstrap 4 is a major rewrite of the entire project. The most notable changes are summarized below, followed by more specific changes to relevant components.

item.title: What's new in Bootstrap 4 ?
item.description: Bootstrap 4 is just round the corner. Bootstrap 4 is a major rewrite of the entire project. Here is list of major changes in latest version of Bootstrap.

item.title: Bootstrap 3.0.2 and 3.0.1 - right direction?
item.description: There‚Äôs no discussion that, Bootstrap is one of the most popular responsive frameworks available, since Twitter released it in 2011. Thanks to an extensive library of cutting edge components, add-ons and plugins it enables fresh ideas and unconventional approach to every next web project. So there‚Äôs no wonder then, that not more than a week ago we‚Äôve heard about Bootstrap 3.0.1, and just two days ago we‚Äôve got Bootstrap 3.0.2. But as our dear old grannies used to say: never too much of a good thing‚Ä¶

item.title: Bootstrap ‚Äì unlimited responsive template?
item.description: Show me your cards (not, not Bootstrap themes yet)‚Ä¶ As we‚Äôre all waiting for top mobile devices premieres, I bet we‚Äôre all satisfied right now. Apple showed its iPhone 5c and iPhone 5s ‚Äì for the first time in history mobile device has been equipped with 64 bit CPU ‚Äì future yet to come? On the other side, Samsung launched its Gear and Note III during IFA fair trade in Berlin

item.title: Genius Bootstrap Admin Template
item.description: We introduced our Genius Bootstrap Admin Template. But does the name oblige? If we look at some of the features like Bootstrap 3.0.0, write with LESS and almost 1500 icon (among them Glyphicons PRO), you can easily say that Genius Bootstrap can be(come) Einstein in the world of Bootstrap templates.
